name: ADRENALIN MISFITS
description: The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Spanish. This game requires a Kinect™ Sensor.  A pick-up and play, simple and easy Kinect-only title! Using the latest technology of Kinect, experience total game immersion so you feel like you're actually riding on a real board!  You play as a cool monster in ADRENALIN MISFITS. Race against 7 enemy monsters throughout 7 worlds! Beating enemy monsters allows you to play as them as you progress in the game. Of course, you can use your favorite avatar to ride a board!  Winning in a tournament and clearing under various conditions will get you original boards! These new boards will enhance your speed, jumping, and techniques. There is a total of over 50 kinds of boards!
